message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9,000.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Can we meet in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I think $7,500 is a bit low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $8,500.
I'm still interested in the product, but I need to be within my budget. Can you meet me at $7,000?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I've already compromised a bit in the previous rounds. I'm willing to meet you at $8,000, which is the minimum I can sell it for. I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
I'm still interested in the product, but I really need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $7,500?
